channel.title: permalink download links
channel.description: @patrick, any chance you can implement a "current" directory to host the latest point release as it comes out on sourceforge? if done, documentation for using the cli to download the ova and asc file could likely remain the same for long periods of time, despite the changing numbers in filenames as new releases come out.

item.title: permalink download links
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This was implemented.

https://download.whonix.org/ova/current/
https://download.whonix.org/ova/current/Whonix-CLI-current.ova
https://download.whonix.org/ova/current/Whonix-XFCE-current.ova

item.title: permalink download links
item.dc:creator: tempest
item.description:
@patrick, any chance you can implement a “current” directory to host the latest point release as it comes out on sourceforge? if done, documentation for using the cli to download the ova and asc file could likely remain the same for long periods of time, despite the changing numbers in filenames as new releases come out.

Read full topic
